thread.title: Jimmy Kimmel Vandalizes Matt Damon's Oscar Photo
thread.title_full: Jimmy Kimmel Vandalizes Matt Damon's Oscar Photo

author: Erica Gonzales
title: Jimmy Kimmel Vandalizes Matt Damon's Oscar Photo
text:
The first item on Jimmy Kimmel's Oscar hosting agenda? Trolling Matt Damon. In the spirit of their long-running (faux) feud, the Academy Awards emcee trashed the actor's seating assignment photo with a couple of horns, an awful goatee and missing teeth. Kimmel dubbed his vandalized masterpiece "Best Picture Vominee Matt Damon."
Best Picture Vominee Matt Damon #Oscars
A post shared by Jimmy Kimmel (@jimmykimmel) on Feb 23, 2017 at 6:58pm PST
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below He's not stopping here with his anti-Damon agenda. We might see some hijinks the night of the ceremony, too. "I'm going to do everything I can to make sure that he doesn't win or doesn't know that he won," Kimmel told The Hollywood Reporter . "My goal is to keep him offstage."
Likewise, Damon doesn't wish the host well, either. "It's horrible for everybody. I'm just being honest, you know. I mean, probably bad for me too, but bad for America," the actor, who produced the Oscar-nominated Manchester by the Sea , said on Ellen .
